markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quaking Stomp](/Feats.aspx?ID=178) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 93 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

</column>

---

You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake, with the effects of the [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) spell.
name: Quaking Stomp
